message: Uh, yeah, hello? There's a huge fire... looks like a warehouse downtown. It's getting big.
desc: Structure fire reported at downtown warehouse.

message: Help! The convenience store on the corner of Sainte-Catherine and a guy has a gun, he's robbing the place!
desc: Armed robbery in progress at a convenience store.

message: My car was just stolen. It's a blue Honda Civic, license plate... I don't remember. From the street parking on Granville.
desc: Blue Honda Civic reported stolen from street parking.

message: There's a party next door and it's so loud, the music is shaking my windows. It's been hours.
desc: Loud noise and disturbance complaint in a residential area.

message: I think my wallet was just stolen. I was in the ByWard Market and someone bumped into me.
desc: Wallet reported stolen, suspecting pickpocket in a crowded market.

message: Someone broke my back window and is inside my house, I can hear them downstairs.
desc: Active break-in at a residence, suspect currently inside.
